school_tradition: Media theory, Toronto School of communication theory
notable_ideas: The medium is the message, global village (term)
influences: Giambattista Vico, Harold Innis, Eric A. Havelock, Thomas Nashe, G. K. Chesterton, I. A. Richards, F. R. Leavis, Wyndham Lewis, T.S. Elliot, Ezra Pound, James Joyce, Marcel Duchamp, Moses Hadas
influenced: Walter J. Ong, Abbie Hoffman, Neil Postman, Timothy Leary, Camille Paglia, Terence McKenna, Wired (magazine), William Irwin Thompson, Paul Levinson, Douglas Rushkoff, B.W. Powe, Douglas Coupland, Jean Baudrillard, Norbert Bolz
